name: Untitled Generic Clicker Game
description:
I made this random clicker game because I was bored and wanted to experiment. In making this I realized that a clicker game is literally just a bunch of variables and if statements. This was kind of low effort but whatever, it was fun to make (minus the save and load system).

This art was made super quickly so yea don't insult me for that. Also I kept forgetting to upload this until now finally.
